description: Try our easy to follow Cauliflower & Chickpea Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Curry,Eggplant,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Rice,Cauliflower,Dairy free
name: Cauliflower & Chickpea Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes or until softened. Add coriander stem and cook for a further 2 minutes. Add curry paste and turmeric, then cook for a further 2 minutes or until fragrant. Add cauliflower, chickpeas, eggplant and milk, then cook, partially covered, for 30 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Season.
Divide rice among bowls, top with chickpea mixture, then scatter over coriander leaves and cashews to serve.
